title: Designing a Semi-Supervised Learning-Based Transportation Mode Identification System

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learns to design federated learning-based transportation identification systems in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with emphasis on practical approaches considering personal information protection

learning_goals: Explain the basic principles of semi-supervised and federated learning and apply them to real-world traffic data collection environments.
Design and evaluate a transportation mode identification model using limited labeled data.
A model learning process can be designed that considers personal information protection in smartphone-based data collection environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
